name: Anthony E. OLIVER, Petitioner, v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS of Philadelphia County, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Oliver v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Anthony E. OLIVER, Petitioner, v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS of Philadelphia County, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of October, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus to Compel Lower Court to Correct Illegal Sentence is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 1153
Anthony E. OLIVER, Petitioner, v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS of Philadelphia County, Respondent.
No. 117 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 15, 2007.
